sentence.text: The 18 new diagnoses made with WGS included structural and non-exonic sequence variants not detectable with whole-exome sequencing, and confirmed recent disease associations with the genes GPI anchor biosynthetic process, RNU4ATAC, negative regulation of fat cell differentiation, and UNC13A.ConclusionWGS as a primary clinical test provided a higher diagnostic yield than conventional genetic testing in a clinically heterogeneous cohort

entity.text: negative regulation of fat cell differentiation
